content:
Cesky Krumlov is a beautiful town and there are many things to see and do there. Here are some of the must-see attractions and activities:

1. Cesky Krumlov Castle - This impressive castle complex is the highlight of the town and includes a museum, a beautiful baroque theater, and stunning gardens. 2. Old Town - The historic center of Cesky Krumlov is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and is filled with winding cobblestone streets, colorful buildings, and charming cafes and shops. 3. The Vltava River - Take a leisurely boat tour along the Vltava River to see the town from a different perspective and take in the scenic views. 4. Egon Schiele Art Centre - This museum showcases the work of the famous Austrian painter Egon Schiele, who spent time in the town. 5. Plague Column - This striking column was erected in the 18th century to commemorate the end of a devastating plague epidemic. 6. Wine Tasting - The region around Cesky Krumlov is known for its excellent wines, so be sure to try some of the local varietals at one of the town's many wine bars. These are just a few examples of the many things to see and do in Cesky Krumlov. With its rich history and stunning architecture, the town is sure to charm visitors of all interests.
